definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The navy tied the enemy down with gunfire.
Sporadic gunfire from insurgents down the main road flies harmlessly overhead.
sentences.chinese: 暴亂分子零星的炮火聲在主街道上空迴盪。

sentences.english: How many times must the cannonballs fly.
We replied to the enemy's attack with a barrage.
sentences.chinese: 我軍以齊射的炮火回擊敵軍的進攻。

sentences.english: The city was bombarded with enemy shells for a whole day.
sentences.chinese: 該城被敵人炮火轟擊了整整一天。

sentences.english: In a flash of gunpowder, a giant explodes onto the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 在隆隆炮火的閃射中，歷史舞臺上出現了一個大人物。

sentences.english: The ship was holed along the WL under enemy fire.
sentences.chinese: 這隻船的喫水線處被敵人的炮火擊穿了。

sentences.english: A few got involved in furious firefights.
sentences.chinese: 也有幾個人遭到猛烈的炮火。

sentences.english: The flat land gave the soldiers no cover from enemy fire.
sentences.chinese: 空曠地使軍隊無法躲避敵人的炮火。

sentences.english: Their houses were endamaged by the enemy's shellfire.
sentences.chinese: 他們的房屋被敵人炮火擊毀了。

sentences.english: An enemy battery zeroed in on the crossroad.
sentences.chinese: 敵人炮兵集中炮火於那個十字路口。

sentences.english: The next salvos were right on target.
sentences.chinese: 第二波炮火就準確砸在目標上了。

sentences.english: Enemy fire battered the walls of the fort.
sentences.chinese: 敵人炮火轟擊城堡的圍牆。

sentences.english: The Harvester fell to his blasterfire, which caused the Reaper to collapse.
sentences.chinese: 採集器被他的炮火擊壞，這也導致了收割器的崩壞。

sentences.english: The navy tied the enemy down with big gun fired while the marines landed on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 陸戰隊在海灘登陸時，海軍用猛烈的炮火牽制敵人。

sentences.english: But the soldiers displayed perfect discipline under the fire of the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 但是士兵在敵人的炮火之下顯示了他們的良好紀律。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
